gradual_flow_enabled.label: Gradual flow enabled
gradual_flow_enabled.description: Enable gradual flow changes. When enabled, the flow is gradually increased/decreased to the target flow. This is useful for printers with a bowden tube where the flow is not immediately changed when the extruder motor starts/stops.

max_flow_acceleration.label: Gradual flow max acceleration
max_flow_acceleration.description: Maximum acceleration for gradual flow changes
max_flow_acceleration.comment: when enabled, each second the flow will at max be increased/decreased by this value

layer_0_max_flow_acceleration.label: Initial layer max flow acceleration
layer_0_max_flow_acceleration.description: Minimum speed for gradual flow changes for the first layer

gradual_flow_discretisation_step_size.label: Gradual flow discretisation step size
gradual_flow_discretisation_step_size.description: Duration of each step in the gradual flow change

reset_flow_duration.label: Reset flow duration
reset_flow_duration.description: For any travel move longer than this value, the material flow is reset to the paths target flow
